title: Chargeback
body:
A friend of mine was recently.....*insert drama here with family.* and received a chargeback ban. i looked it all up but some information still seems out of there. 

first of all his account is locked he did not get an email he sent a support ticket they told him he had a chargeback of 20CAD., and directed him to a website. when he logs into this website it shows he owes them nothing at all so he cannot unlock his account by any means because there website shows him he doesnt owe them anything.

secondly he used some of the RP to get a hero for himself "kled" and he gifted me woad scout quinn. the skin is gone off my account. i no longer have access to woad scout quinn.

these two things being stated. One. How do we fix his chargeback when he doesnt owe anything? Two. will i get my woad scout quinn back and will he get kled back once the suspension is lifted?

replies.body: he has been waiting for a responce. and he will be paying it back i just wanted to know if the skin was going ot be put back into my account once the chargeback is paid.

Since this chargeback issue deals with personal information, there's not much I can do on the boards to help. You can get more context into what happened with the skin you got from him if you write to us in a ticket.

Also if your friend isn't seeing a chargeback amount, have him submit a ticket as well and our billing specialists will be able to get that fixed for him.
